::DrillBit::

He ran out of the bridge, his gattaling gun ready. He tracked it to the
sci lab.
"Get away from her, or your slag!"

::Hot Rod::

With tha battle nearly over, he decided to go to base.
"Vehical mode." He transformed to car, and took off.
